fields.request: Manual QA: Validate Customer Account billing and auto top-up fields
fields.request_details:
1. Open the Customer Accounts admin and edit an existing account.
2. Confirm the Billing section displays Balance (MXN), Minimum Purchase, Energy Tariff, and credit card fields.
3. Assign an Energy Tariff, enter a Balance and Minimum Purchase, and save the account.
4. Re-open the record to verify the values persist and the Energy Summary collapsible shows updated balances.
5. Create a new Energy Transaction via the Customer Account change form inlines to confirm transactions are stored with tariff and conversion factor details.
